caption.p: Comparison of HAP P value distributions between Mexico and Canada/United States. −Log 10 P value transformations for the top 201 Gag HAPs found in Mexico and Canada/United States (A) and the top 157 PR-RT HAPs found in Mexico and Canada/United States (B) are shown. Transformed P values are ranked from smallest (least significant) to largest (most significant) in each cohort and plotted as paired observations. The red line represents the null expectation. (C and D) −Log 10 P value distribution of shared versus unique HAPs observed in Mexico in Gag (C) and PR-RT (D).
